input.sentences: we rented a cabin in the woods
it was such a good time
output.sentences: We are on a budget so instead of a hotel we rented a cabin the the woods.
The cabin was nice enough in a quaint kind of way.
The kitchen came fully stocked with dishes and cookware but I'm a germ freak so I had to wash everything before we could use it.
The bathroom makes you want to vomit and I've thought about it but I don't think red was a popular color for bathroom fixtures in any time period.
That's okay though because I will put up with an obnoxious bathroom if it means I'm only a two minute walk from the beach.
